languages.text: "Нет, маршал. Я не буду повиноваться вам, пока вы повинуетесь префекту, устроившей этот фарс ради своих целей".
"No, Marshal. I will not obey you while you obey the prefect, who has put on this farce solely to further her own interests."
languages.original_text: "Нет, маршал. Я не буду повиноваться вам, пока вы повинуетесь префекту, устроившей этот фарс ради своих целей".

traits.locale_text: "No, Marshal. I will not obey you while you obey the prefect, who has put on this farce solely to further her own interests."
"No, Marshal. I will not obey you while you obey the prefect, who has put on this farce solely to further her own interests."
"No, Marshal. I will not obey you while you obey the prefect, who has put on this farce solely to further her own interests."

"No, Marshal. I will not obey you while you obey the prefect, who has put on this farce solely to further her own interests."

languages.text: "Nein, Marschall. Ich werde Euch nicht gehorchen, solange Ihr der Präfektin gehorcht, die mit dieser Farce ihre eigenen Interessen verfolgt."
languages.original_text: "No, Marshal. I will not obey you while you obey the prefect, who has put on this farce solely to further her own interests."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, Marschall. Ich werde Euch nicht gehorchen, solange Ihr der Präfektin gehorcht, die mit dieser Farce ihre eigenen Interessen verfolgt."

languages.text: « Non, Maréchal. Je refuse de suivre vos ordres tant que vous vous soumettez à la préfète, qui n'a orchestré cette farce que pour servir ses propres intérêts. »
languages.original_text: "No, Marshal. I will not obey you while you obey the prefect, who has put on this farce solely to further her own interests."

traits.locale_text: « Non, Maréchal. Je refuse de suivre vos ordres tant que vous vous soumettez à la préfète, qui n'a orchestré cette farce que pour servir ses propres intérêts. »

languages.text: 「いいえ、将帥。私はあなたには従いません。なぜなら、あなたが従っているその総監は、自分の利益のためだけにこの茶番を演じているのですから」
languages.original_text: "No, Marshal. I will not obey you while you obey the prefect, who has put on this farce solely to further her own interests."

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ、将帥。私はあなたには従いません。なぜなら、あなたが従っているその総監は、自分の利益のためだけにこの茶番を演じているのですから」

languages.text: «No, Mariscal. No le obedeceré mientras usted obedezca a la prefecta, que ha organizado esta farsa en beneficio propio».
languages.original_text: "No, Marshal. I will not obey you while you obey the prefect, who has put on this farce solely to further her own interests."

traits.locale_text: «No, Mariscal. No le obedeceré mientras usted obedezca a la prefecta, que ha organizado esta farsa en beneficio propio».

languages.text: “我拒绝，元帅。我不会服从你的命令，除非你不再听从行政官的命令。她为了一己私欲，上演了这场闹剧。”
languages.original_text: "No, Marshal. I will not obey you while you obey the prefect, who has put on this farce solely to further her own interests."

traits.locale_text: “我拒绝，元帅。我不会服从你的命令，除非你不再听从行政官的命令。她为了一己私欲，上演了这场闹剧。”

languages.text: "Hayır Miralay. Siz, kendi çıkarları uğruna bu maskaralığı sergileyen prefekte itaat ettiğiniz sürece ben size asla boyun eğmem."
languages.original_text: "No, Marshal. I will not obey you while you obey the prefect, who has put on this farce solely to further her own interests."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır Miralay. Siz, kendi çıkarları uğruna bu maskaralığı sergileyen prefekte itaat ettiğiniz sürece ben size asla boyun eğmem."
